content.detailedDescription:
1- smoking a cigarette and standing in a gas station parking lot.
2- it was a glowing v shape in the sky.
3- a small skein of snow geese.
4- chevron shaped, 7 lights, level flight ( approximately 500 ft above).
5- after realizing that the chevron was lit, and not a flock of snow geese- i was very surprised. i exited my vehicle to take a closer look.  their speed increased dramatically as they got closer, passed over me, and then they banked over the mountains and disappeared into the current snow storm.
6-the chevron banked along the side of the mountain and i lost sight of them.
content.summary: It was lightly snowing and i looked up to sky and saw a small skein of snow geese. they moved quicker and became larger- above, they banked a right turn and disappeared into the mountains.

content.detailedDescription: I lived in a town house, and often sleep on the ground floor in my living room on the coutch, where i can see both front & back doors including a sliding glass patio door leading to the back yard. this event occoured approximately in the early morning hours of late april of 2012. i am a 31yr old male army veteran, and lived alone at the time. being a former military man, i was and am still a very avid and active supporter of self defence. during and also after my military service i have always kept a weapon in my home for self defence purposes. even sleeping with a weapon (.380 caliber pistol) no further than arms length, in case of intruder/burgler. up until this event i was also very skeptical and unbelieving of anything i hadn't seen with my own eyes, especially things of a paranormal/supernatural etc. nature. all of this changed one early morning of april, 2012. about 4:45am one morning as i slept on my living room couch a strange feeling came across me and awoke me from my sleep into the pitch blackness of the room. as i moved myself to the sitting position, i saw a small flash of yellowish  light piercing my sliding glass patio door through the closed; tall swaying blinds. at first i didnt think much of it until only seconds later not only did i see another flash of light, this time the flash was red and seemed larger. thinking maybe there was an intruder inside the closed wooden gate of my backyard i quickly grabbed my silver .380 pistol from the floor near the couch and hurried to look thru the blinds. what i saw next changed my life and has affected me mentally until this day. as i stood at the sliding glass door looking across the parking lot maybe 60 feet away on the rooftop of the adjacent townhome directly in front of me was a perfectly round extremly bright orb which could have been approximately 5 to 6 feet in diameter. i couldn't help feeling as if i was being beckoned to come to the door with these flashes of light. after about 10 seconds or so of staring at the bright luminescent orb it had doubled in size and again changed color to yellowish green in a single flash of bright light. immediately following the flash there was what sounded like a large very loud hellicopter if one would have been directly above my house. at the same time the orb grew something that looked like a large praying mantis mixed with a snake flew out of the orb and straight up, i could see that it had what seemed like a long 3-4 ft tail as it exited what i can only describe as a "portal" and then the portal was gone. almost as quickly as it had exited this orb, the being flew directly toward me as now the loud sound was ear peircing and the being moved at an incomprehensible speed toward me, it took all of 2-3 seconds to cross the 60+ft of parking lot between the adjacent rooftop of the town home directly behind mine, over my wooden backyard fence where it came to a stop directly in front of me no more than two and a half feet, hovering about five feet off the ground. at this time the creature displayed no lights it was all black with what seemed like very strange symbols i had never seen before that went across its midsection (torso area). at first glimpse i could only describe this being as a bio-mechanical praying mantis mixed with a snake. it had a small head, long ringed neck but very large in-laid black eyes that extended beyond the sides of its head, which i saw last as i quickly and carfully looked it over from bottom to top, my jaw stood wide in awe. out of sheer terror and the close proximity it was to me, i immediately raised my weapon over my head and pressed it firmly against the glass of the sliding doors. almost as soon as i had made this motion the entity while still hovering in midair less than 3 feet away from me separated by only the glass of the patio door. the creature then extended from both sides what i can only describe as two sets of wing like appendages and emitted what looked like hundreds of tiny blue, sparkling lightning bolts in every direction, above and below each of the 4 "appendages" (i say appendages because if they were wings they didn't seem to be used for flight, just because of the sheer fact it did not use them after it exited the large orb like "portal" from which it had emerged and flew directly towards me, nor did it use them to hover in place) which seemed to encompass and engulf the being completely  (at this moment the loud helicopter, static like sound had stopped). each of these small blue lightning bolt like energy emissions were no larger than my pinky finger, after just a few short seconds of me witnessing these "lightning bolt" like electric emissions the entity shot directly up and over the roof of my home at an amazing speed out sight toward the front of the townhome. after much time and thought i've come to the conclusion that this entity did not spread the wing like appendages and emit the plasma like discharge until i brandished my weapon leading to me to believe that this display must have been some sort of protective energy field to shield itself had i fired upon it. although this entire encounter which started at about 4:45 a.M. and lasted no longer than 5-6min. or less. about 2min. after the being had disapeared out of view over my home i quicky ran to the back door less than about 3ft. away from where i stood and went outside. as i stood there staring into the sky i immediately realized that it had left almost the exact time of dawn because the sun was coming up. honestly i dont like giving this part of the account but at that moment i realized that what i thought to be only 5-6min. in reality, over an hour had passed because it was now dawn with the sun quickly rising and till this day, years later im still no closer to an answer of what this being could have been, what it wanted, why it beckoned me to the door with the light flashes, and most importantly what happened during that missing hour... (if anyone has had a similar experience and/or any further information that could help, it would be greatly appreciated.)
content.summary: Entity exited large glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: Every morning at daybreak 6:30ish, i leave my apartment, i looked up and saw a big huge face staring at me!. well it felt that way but in all honesty i think they were interested in city hall government building. they hover over government buildings and make evil faces. they have destroyed government buildings in antiquity, there are religious pictures depicting this. they are not all disk shape they come in a few different forms, boxy, multi craft hovering silent and perfectly still like they can orbit at building level. strange way to explain this but it's all true. every since i started writing about my home city they have been hovering over my home in front of city hall making faces and pictures. i discovered pixel data hidden within the clouds and even where none seem to be they are making art in color up in the sky, i discovered if i ran a special algorithm it produces real pictures bi color diamond pattern snakes. i know it is a lot to take in but this is going on now and i have pictures showing in more detail than i have seen on any youtube video.
content.summary: I stepped out with my sp-camera saw more crafts took pictures.

content.detailedDescription: This event followed case #89604, exactly twelve hours later. on december 31, 7pm, witness saw side-by-side square lights of indeterminate distance straight overhead. they flared twice, slowly, with a pure-white brilliance that lit up the whole yard, then vanished with the object stationary and silent. at 7am january 1, 2018, witness emerged from physical body, passed through wall of bedroom, and went nw about 200 feet, then turned and faced se. at that point, witness observed deep solid-blue craft of strongly rectangular shape (corners slightly rounded) descend from 45 degrees directly above mobile home. it descended smoothly and quietly, to stop and hover quite motionless about ten feet above ground, directly behind witness's bedroom. an opening appeared in bottom of craft, and a ramp was lowered to ground.  witness observed twin panels set into bottom of craft which could be possible sources of the lights observed on dec.31. three men in uniforms descended the ramp and came to ground.  each wore a different color uniform. there was a person whom i thought might be a mechanic, because his white uniform was fitted with pockets and loops all over, from which could be seen numerous tools/apparatus of  unfamiliar design. another man wore red, and the man that i thought might be the leader wore a uniform of the same blue as his craft.  if there were emblems or insignia, i didn't notice them, for once i approached to within several feet of the men, my eyes were captured by those of the man in blue, and i remained directly under his mental control for the remainder of the experience.  all three men had golden hair, worn somewhat short but not severe.  the leader's hair was very curly.  his eyes were a sort of purple-violet, and the pupils were not really round: somewhere between round and diamond-shaped. they stood tall and muscular.  under the leader's control, i nonetheless went willing up into their craft.  the inside was compact but not cramped, filled with screens, especially. i saw very little in the way of controls, but the screens responded to touch and also to direct mind control. i was seated facing the leader, and he never broke eye contact. he was very kind and intuitive: i think that he knew me better than i know myself.  his voice was strong and colorful, but i heard it only in my mind. i spoke back in the same manner. we rose up in the sky, but stayed withing a few hundred feet of the ground. i could see the ground clearly below: even the floor could be made transparent, or perhaps it doubled as another viewing screen. we traveled in a circle above three of the neighboring roads, for perhaps a half-hour.  the entire time, we spoke telepathically.  i had endless questions, and the answers were often slow and careful. much was told to me, but i can no longer remember anything except: "does your craft utilize antigravity?" he replied, "that is what you call it. we have the ability to attract and repel numerous all-pervasive forces." there was always a language barrier, because they were literally ages more advanced than anything i can imagine.  all too soon, i was returned, and they departed.  i felt they would be back.  the next day, my body suddenly began to reject a synthetic opioid prescription that i had taken for almost nine years, following a head-on collision that put me in the hospital for a month. the withdrawal from this medicine is unbelievably horrible: i've never been so sick.  but my mind is emerging from a drugged haze, and perhaps that is the point: maybe those visitors knew what i didn't. or maybe just a coincidence? perhaps.  but it feels like they are here to help us out - if we are willing to be helped.
content.summary: Rectangular,mirror-like,dark blue, square panels underneath(lights),ramp,entities,abduction(willing)telepathic communication,returned less than one hour.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i went outside for a cigarette and saw the objects in the sky. there were 2 of them, fairly close together. they seemed silvery with lights that were reddish and a few green. they moved at different speeds and moved up, down, left, and right. they seemed to hover/vibrate/pulsate as they weren't still. a tiny red light moved from the one on the right.....The red light moved from the right of the object at an angle really fast and seemed to go to the ground. we got our binoculars and could see the shapes better, like long, oval, cigar shapes. also could see the lights, like a ring of red around the middle. this was not a plane, helicopter.....Nothing i ever saw in the air force moved in the many directions these objects moved.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Wife and i saw 2 oval shapes, moving in different directions with very bright lights.

content.detailedDescription: I had fallen asleep in my mom's bedroom from watching a movie with her. i woke up after seeing a light turn on in the kitchen. for some reason it felt like time stopped, it was like white noise and for some reason my mom nor the dogs were waking up. i saw this entity, that looked male. he was picking up different things and staring at them for a bit before putting them back down. i grabbed my bedside lamp, fearing he was a thief. he moved swiftly and quickly through the kitchen and living room. before i knew it, he was in the bedroom and my mom and the dogs were still not waking up. i was holding the lamp over my chest trying to protect myself. the man/alien moved closer towards me and i turned on the lamp that i was holding to my chest to see better thinking i might as well see the person thats about to hurt me. it was weird, he was probably like 5'10ish and had the body of a man and his face was like a human but the eyes were frightening.His eyes were small slits and completely black and glassy. he was wearing a completely black outfit, long sleeves and pants. he also didn't seem friendly, he looked at me and gave me a creepy smile. i felt very afraid, like i had met him before and knew what was coming?  then he moved forward and touched me and everything went black and thats all i remember. for some reason, i had this strange feeling when i woke up that he was a hybrid? i don't know what that means, like half human half alien? i also had a strange marking on my face that very faint, it was 2 blue hexagons near my mouth and i had light bruises on my body, was also kinda sore.
content.summary: Alien was in my bedroom.

content.detailedDescription:
My name is david c. sitzman and i testify this account is true and accurate. no drug use or alcohol plays any part of this instance. on the night of july 14th, 2016, around 11:45pm, i was tossing garbage out, then decided to look-up at a beautifully star-lit clear night before turning in. while cranking my neck straight up to view the stars, a sudden ripple-like clear wave happened and instantly a huge, dark, triangular craft then appeared. i watched with stunned amazement as this craft (being about 3 house sizes big) hovered about 800 feet or so over me standing in place, then after about a minute or two, it lurched forward to hover over my neighbor's house. after a minute or two more, it then very suddenly shot away due west.

****the most curious factors of this event were that:1)it seemed as if this craft suddenly came out of a warp, thus producing this tear or rip in the clear night sky. and when it 1st appeared, it blocked out a number of the stars i had been looking at, so i knew it was something physical.2) put off no noise at all. 3) appeared to be the same triangular shape as the "atari" asteroids craft with a slight scoop at the bottom.4)each of the 3 corners of the craft had a very bright white light. no beams or anything like that.5) watching it shoot out of sight at such incredible speed, holds true to just about every other sighting i've watched on history channel's "ancient aliens" shows.

unless luke afb has gotten their hands on something big, none of our military craft can maneuver at such high speeds with no sound.

i didn't feel frightened at all, but more intent on mentally capturing everything going on at that time. i was terribly excited afterward, but felt unsure about reporting it immediately.
content.summary: While star-gazing, it suddenly looked as though a rip (wave/clear) in the sky showed itself, then a very large triangular craft was now in my sight. hovered overed our house, lurched forward to hover over neighbor's house, then shot out of sight due west.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving north on 395 towards mammoth, almost near the mammoth exit. 
i was looking at a plane above, noting how remarkable the contrail looked with the colors in the sky.The plane heads west over mountains. suddenly a cylindrical object appears and its much, much larger than the plane i just saw. the cylindrical object flies faster than the plane did, heading north west. second object appears directly parallel to first object. both objects changed into an orb shape. 1st object heads slightly perpidicular to 2nd object and disappears suddenly. 2nd object continues north west but turns slightly more westward. 2nd object radiates massive bright light. 2nd object heads away quickly, still shining and disappears after a few minutes.
content.summary: Two bright lights materialized, then disappeared one after the other

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room and i was playing on my laptop. i saw blinking lights coming from outside my window. i thought it was an airplane. at first i was like whatever then i saw the lights going all around the ship and then i started freaking out the only thing i was feeling was horror. i couldn't move at all i was paralyzed and once it passed all i could think about was that i wasn't going to be where i was right then when i woke up. it flew past my window and when i looked out my window that went to the other side where i should have saw it, it wasn't there.
content.summary: Round and had a smaller circle at the top

content.detailedDescription:
Alexandra louisiana driving north. 
well. you couldn’t miss them
event lights 
eclipse shaped moving in a rapid circular motion behind the clouds. 
well we were a little freaked out. fearful at worst. 
they moved further and further away until they were invisible to our eyes.
content.summary: Driving north on. i-49 2 blueish greenish lights began to cut circle quickly over head. we witnessed the lights for 35 miles. we ruled out the possibility of  sky lights because no beam wasn’t projected. the lights were behind the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband were walking out of wal-mart and i noticed a full moon so that attracted me to look at the moon. i then noticed a bright object around the clouds moving in a triangular pattern in and around the clouds under the moon. at first i thought it could be a reflection from lights but then thought it was way to high for a reflection from lights. i then saw the object move and decided to take pictures. it really looked like a space ship. i figured it could be a plane but planes don't maneuver like this object did. it finally went behind the clouds and we didn't see it anymore. we then left the parking lot.
content.summary: A glowing object changing direction rapidly in triangular pattern under the moon in and out of clouds.

content.detailedDescription: On that morning i took the dogs out and smoke while i wait for them. we have our deck on the second story, the land is all cleared as a housing project is going in next door,i had my back to it when i turned around it was just sitting there!Around 100 ft away and about that fron the ground . i don't know how long it was watching, it makes no sound.As i was looking at it, it almost seemed to get brighter,it hurt my eyes almost like a cloaking light,i couldnt define the shape...Then. im sure it wanted me to see it and me to knowit saw me as well. all the sudden it shot to the south into a very low orangeish cloud,leaving an intense orange streak like a meteor, as it was leaving when it was farther away i could see the blue exaust color right under the ship,it helped me see the bottom outter rim shape and some brushed metal look and there was a small black area. after it went out of my sight i kept looking it was way up it did a zig zag higher each time then moved in a half circle to the westas high as i could see. its odd because i was not filled with fear, i did not want to closer to get a better look because of my dogs.I think they were looking at the construction site, because of artifacts. the news mentioned it in passing the day after, talking about broken cloud syndrome but i haven't seen that lady newscaster lately, king 5 i think
content.summary: I was outside in the morning and when i turned around it was right there! so bright, its hard to look at, then it jetted to the south leaving a orange heat trail behind.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On christmas morning approximately around 8:30 am,my husband and i were in galveston,texas to celebrate with family. we were driving down seawall blvd. approaching 61st street. i had my husband stop(he stopped our auto  facing the pier) so i could get out and take pictures of the sunrise to send to other family members who were not in galveston. i stood on the seawall sidewalk taking a series of pictures with my apple iphone se. i stood in the same place and position,as i rapidly took several pictures.
   later that evening when i was reviewing the pictures i had taken that day, i noticed the greenish orb on 3 of the pictures. it was apparent it was moving eastward and upward when compared to the clouds and using the pier house as a reference point. again i emphasize i stood still in the same position just taking picture after picture in quick succession. when
i enlarge the object, i am able to see a grid pattern and what is either windows or some type of white orbs docked on it. i do notice in the succeeding pictures the white lights or orbs seems to be moving around the green object and are not stationary. 
   what is strange to both my husband and me is that neither of us saw this large object with our eyes. he was facing the pier waiting for me in the car and i scouted out what i wanted in the pictures prior to taking them. also, no other pictures that i took that day or even later has this object showing, so i have ruled out any dust or dirt on my camera lens. 
   i am attaching 4 pictures by time sequence. the 1st picture has nothing showing. the next 3 pictures do.
content.summary: Sighting picked up by camera when i stopped to take sunrise pictures over gulf

content.detailedDescription: I have seen ufo activity often for approximately 5 months now. on this night i walked outside to have a cigarette around 1am. it was a crystal clear that night and i'm away from the city, which means you can see everything if you're not familiar. almost instantly , i record on phone after my cig was lit and within seconds i catch this object not only with my camera but my own eyes move in ways that are not possible for our technology in the air. it was flashing red and white and many would think it's a star until you pay closer attention to detail. it moved so fast it vanished within seconds and the best part was there was not a single sound.
content.summary: I went outside last night to smoke a cigarette and had been seeing lights prior to this incident. i had my phone on record while smoking and captured a pretty incredible 15 seconds. i don't know what it was, which is why i'm here.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a military base i don’t remember the name i awoke unable to go to sleep in a few seconds about 3 to 5 seconds i saw colorful lights i was on the second story of the building i saw the lights i had a feeling or gut reaction not to move i was paralyzed with fear the lights went to the edge of the room everything went black for about 3 to 4 hours then everything wasn’t black any more and i don’t remember what happened during that time
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was ion the 6th floor of a building at the crosstreets of alder and 10th street. the object was observed in the southeast heading north. the sky’s were close to the same grey and lead color of the object. it was a sphere shape and had no lights that i seen. the elevation it was traveling at was a bit above the normal height a helicopter would travel. it was just a consistent speed but nothing exstremely fast. as it headed north and started to come over the building it seemed to be spinning i’m assuming cause it was wobbleing like a top when it starts to slow down. i didn’t take a video cause i was in awe trying to figure out if i was seeing what i was seeing. i don’t have a logical reason of any device being able to fit the discription. no lights, no propellers or blades. no landing gear or anything. just a sphere moving across the sky.
content.summary: I was on the 6th floor of a building. it was heading north. elevation was higher than a helicopter a bit and moved less speed than a jet.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting in our hot tub when she asked me if i saw the ball of light in the woods.  i then looked to the east and spotted what she first saw.  the ball of light was approximately 100 yards away from us as it started to move from left to right through the woods. as it moved, it zig-zagged up and down very sharply by about 10 to 15 feet. the light then disappeared to the east.  immediately after the light vanished, beams of light, like a spot light, began sweeping through the trees. the entire experience lasted approximately 15 minutes. i do know there is a gravel road on the other side of the woods about 1/4 mile from our back property.  this road is used sparingly and i rode my atv to look for vehicle tire tracks the next day but the road was undisturbed except for my atv tire tracks that were quite visible.  it did not rain overnight so the tracks could not have been washed away.  i have lived at this residence for almost 8 years and have never seen this occur before.  

at first i thought it might have been car headlights but the way it was moving through the trees, zig-zagging up and down as it moved, i knew this was not going to be car headlights. my wife asked if it could have been someone with a lantern in the woods. i told her there was no way anyone could move that fast through the woods and the zig-zag up and down movement as it travelled was quite unusual. my wife was extremely scared as i could feel her shaking behind me. i was thinking that if they are here to abduct us, there isn't much i can do about it.  so we sat there watching the beam of light move through the trees until it too disappeared. after about another 15 minutes or so of watching to see if it came back, we then went to bed.

i am retired air force, with over 5,000 flight hours and seen something like this sphere was i was approximately 14 years old in the oregon cascade mountains near the middle sister.  very strange to see it again almost 40 years later.
content.summary: Sphere of light, zig-zagged up and down as it moved from east to sw in the forest.

content.detailedDescription:
J'ã©tais dans mon jardin, j'observais le ciel comme trã¨s souvent; j'ai vu deux lumiã¨res se dã©placaient ensemble trã¨s proche l'une de l'autre comme j'ai l'habitude d'observer des satellites lã  je me suis dit ã§a ne clignote pas donc c'est pas un avion ni hã©licoptã¨re pas de bruit, pas un satellite car les 2 lumiã¨res plus trã¨s bas en altitude et lã  mon intuition me dit vite prend ton tã©lã©phone et filme; je n'ai pas pu filmer trã¨s longtemps car mon portail un peu haut ã©tait fermã© ã  clef 
lors du visionnage de la vidã©o je me suis aperã§u de la forme que je venais filmer et lã  je me suis dit c'est ã©trange j'ã©tais trã¨s excitã©e et intriguã©e
content.summary: Lumiã¨re

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from work i noticed two distinct bright lights approx 500ft static in the sky. on closer observation each object was rectangular with two fixed white lights, one at each side. 

at different heights both motionless probably 50ft-100ft apart as i drove parallel the lights were not visible from the side or rear. forward facing only. 

it was dark, approx 6:40pm january 17th 2018. the objects were between the a47 road and the peterborough city hospital. 

i have video footage from my dash cam available online which can be found by searching for 'ufo over peterborough january 17th 2018'
content.summary: Two identical rectangular objects at different heights, hovering with two white lights each

content.detailedDescription: My family and i along with one friend were setting in the front yard waiting for the fireworks to begin on the 4th of july.  then in the corner of my eye i noticed three distinct reddish-orange lights that were stationary to my left.  i set up the video camera and began filming the formation.  the lights vanished about 40 second after first appearing. see the video for details.
content.summary: Three reddish -orange lights in the form of a triangle

content.detailedDescription:
i am a christian man 76 years old and live in joplin, mo. i watch your youtube programs regularly and have a great appreciation for you and others that bring to light the things that happen to people who have no one, usually, who wants to hear what they have to say about "strange" occourences in their lives.

i have had several things happen that are hard to explain but one of the strangest happened in april of 2016. as i do fairly often, i started out the back door with a cup of coffee to enjoy on the patio. i observed the sky that it was fairly overcast with billowly, light and dark grey clouds and then i saw something that caught my eye and could hardly believe what i was seeing. there in the front area of one of the clouds was an etching which was done in 3-d and not just a drawing. the picture remained on the cloud for another 20 minutes as i looked at it in amazement. there was no action around the picture as long as i watched it but after the 20 minutes it slowly started to go away and the cloud became just another cloud in the sky.

at this time i didn't have a camera that i could take a picture of the design with so i watched the news fully expecting to see the cloud on the news or in the news paper but it never showed up. i tried to make a rough drawing of the design but i am not an artist so my best efforts do it no justice. 

the design was huge and just for a clue, the best i could guess, it was at least as large as a football field and the design was perfectly drawn and it had a nice border all the way around it. it was oval in shape, not square or round.

has anyone else ever came to you with anything like this, ever? if i could get someone to draw the design for me i would be glad to send the drawing but the people i know who could do the drawing show no interest in doing it so as of yet i still only have my rough draft.
content.summary: 3-d picture in a cloud

content.detailedDescription: I discovered the spaceship three years ago.. i then did my own research.. and discovered more..Doing the november and december of 2017 we had rainstorms coming in.. i like taken pictures of the sky when things look different.. i discovered them coming down in human form.. doing that time i also realized they new i was watching and discovered them.Round the end of 2017 i realize i had visitors in my home ..I was scared at first couldn't sleep at night so i started staying at my daughters home ..I noticed they followed me there.On january 2018,8:30am.I got up to lock the door behind my daughter and notice there was two of them looking at me from the left side of the wall...I never imaging seeing this kind of beautiful.. discovery in my life.They very peaceful. i have photos. and also more details.
content.summary: Very flashsy lights.. with very loud humming sound

content.detailedDescription: My buddy and i were parked with two girls in my convertible with the top down on cemetary road just northeast of ladysmith, wi. it was late, perhaps between 10:00 pm and 11:00 pm. one girl screamed and pointed at the object hoovering just above the tree top level and the tree tops were moving back and forth like a strong wind was whipping them. it was a misty night so the object seemed a little blurred but appeared to have dark spots on the hull like windows. we were young (i was 16). we were scared so i started the car and hit the gas heading into town where the local sheriff ran a drive-in restaurant. i believe he was called 'woody' and the restaurant was called the 'tinker tot'. it's still there but closed for decades. we told the sheriff what had happened and another couple came up to us and stated that they had seen it rise from a swamp a little earlier while they were parked off the road. we all raced back to the sighting spot and found that it had moved north up the road were the road took a sharp turn left (west) the object was hovering again near a farm. at that time i counted 16 people observing it (most were kids). one person went into a farmer's house to call the air force and said the farmer and family were frantic. i remember the names of some of the kids but several have passed away by now. i'm 74 years old and should have reported it a long time ago. the incident was reported in the ladysmith news and they asked what we were doing out by the cemetary.
content.summary: Parked in convertible top down. girl screamed. it was overhead. moved north. stopped. disappeared in an instant.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to college in myrtle beach, sc. it was around 3am when i left my apartment and headed towards the 24 hr mcdonald's in conway. i was driving down a road with golf courses on both sides of the road. i looked to my left and out of the driver window i saw 3 bright lights in the sky. they were very bright but seemed small or very far away. the lights seemed yo be in a triangle formation just hovering. when i noticed the lights i immediately pulled to the side of the road and watched from inside the car. i was transfixed. i was not fearful but incredibly confused and fascinated. the lights began darting around each other. short, very fast movements. they looked as if they were birds playing. they darted around each other for several seconds before they simutaniously zipped away. i sat and watched for minutes before i left that spot. it looked like it came from directly over the ocean and they zipped away over the ocean of north myrtle beach. there were 3 bright lights in total but when they zoomed away it seemed like only one. i never reported it until now. i will never forget those lights and the way they moved and how they darted away that fast. i researched for days but could not find evidence of anyone else witnessing these lights. they darted around in all directions around each other, not just left or right but up and down and in all directions.
content.summary: 3 yellow/orange lights darted around each other like playing, then all 3 shot away in the same direction incredibly fast. i pulled over and watched. i will never forget what i saw.

content.detailedDescription: Its a long story. to much to text.I know what i saw and just wanted to tell someone. i was scared as hell. i don't have pictures but it flew right over me as i watched it coming at me.Its  a long  story.Whether you want to hear it or believe it makes no difference to me. just wanted to tell someone
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have not told anyone about this. this is the first time. i hate thinking about it..

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While driving home from work on i-25 between longmont and denver, colorado, i witnessed 6 bright lights hovering in formation approx. above denver intl. airport. i noticed the lights on my approach to the interstate but wrote them off as stars. i lost sight of them as i passed through the area of town closest to the freeway but as i merged onto i-25 regained visual and realized they were not stars. i then assumed them to be landing lights of approaching aircraft, fairly common sight but normally in low visibility which was not an issue this night. i quickly realized this was not the case either as these objects were stationary. they were formed in 2 triangle formations of 3 each, separated by 2-5 miles.  i drove south for approx. 5-7 mins. and observed no motion. after about 6 miles and watching the whole time i exited the freeway and proceeded to a secluded park & ride lot to watch and get some video. as i parked i noticed that 2 of the lights were no longer visible, 1 from each side so now 2 sets of 2 but still motionless and holding formation. as i started filming i noticed another object, smaller with a different appearance, that seemed to be moving slowly between the other lights. this one appeared much dimmer white light but seemed to pulsate. after watching for a minute it seemed to have another light of a green color inside of it that appeared to be spinning. that's the best i can describe it. i documented about 3 minutes of this and observed what i assumed fighter jets inbound from the west, high speed and elevation, at which point i honestly believed that something big was happening and decided i needed to get home to my family. of course, i regret not getting more video but having had a previous encounter and with the location of the event, i firmly believed this situation would escalate, to what degree i didn't know and felt i needed to reach my family. i returned to the freeway and headed south while still observing the event which was now due east when the lights started to vanish and reappear for a short time. i then watched what had been one of the stationary lights start moving, change radiance and take on the pulsing appearance. it traveled slowly to the sw for a short time before abruptly turning due north, opposite my direction of travel, essentially coming straight at me but continuing it's same, slow speed. this is how i confirmed it not to be any commercial aircraft, far too slow. also, it's movement was very smooth, fluid, no degree of erratic movement of any kind. it continued on its northbound path and when at about my 11 o'clock position i attempted to catch more video, which i did but of low quality. it passed over and to my left where i could now see a shape with randomly flashing red and green lights from the bottom side of a square within another square. the lights flashed from center outwards, red front to rear and green to the sides, without rhythm. i'd estimate it's elevation at 1,000 to 2,000 feet at a speed of 100-150mph max, and absent of sound. if one hadn't been watching it it would easily have been dismissed as some common aircraft, i.E. helicopter, smaller plane, and wouldn't have drawn much attention. i watched as long as i could and it continued north, out of sight. by this time i was into the city and couldn't see the remaining lights and by the time i got to where i could see the airport again, all appeared normal again. this all took place over a span of approx. 30 to 40 minutes starting around 11:00pm on a november night in 2016. apologies for the poor video.
content.summary: 6 lights hovering in formation +1 'go-between', w/ video

content.detailedDescription: We were driving home it was about 9:15 i stopped in mid conversation freaking out because i saw this bright bright light in the sky not moving and  it's the second time i had seen it but first time i had seen it with someone my girlfriend drove to an opening in my neighwere we recorded the event we drove passed a house which blocked the view of it then reversed when we did this it was gone there was absolutely no trace of anything
content.summary: Bright non flashing light hovering in sky for a few minutes we passed a house that blocked view then it had disappeared

content.detailedDescription: This will be the third one i've reported since oct. my sister who was aware of my previous sightings, was keeping sn eye in the sky as i saw the same last night. she called and told us to look outside and there it was. the same bright light every one else has seen it seems, only mine was tainted slightly by a street light. after the lihjy started to fade i was able to see what looked like the silhouette of a triangle. i couldn't get video in time so i snapped a quick photo. it also seems to look like a triangle.My husband who is active duty military saw the same and it just took off so fast it left like a trail. never seen anything like it. soon after fighters and oth3r jets were launched and there was an odd military jet i've not seen here flying low over ism i noticed what looked like fighters circling the airspace. i don't think it was any type odrill because if so, either he (husband) can't say ot anyhow ill attach the photos
content.summary: Saw several small lights and one bright light and what seemed to be a triangle shape craft

content.detailedDescription: 1-11-18, inflight from seattle to las vegas, etd from seatac about 1540, spirit airlines. i was taking scenery pictures (aircraft left) on the mostly clear, late afternoon, although there was intermittent cloud cover below. suddenly i briefly saw an object coming our way much closer than other aircraft. i thought it had to be an airplane coming too close,but i never saw what looked like an aircraft. my camera was already at the window so i quickly got a few pictures without focusing as there was no time. it went by and over/behind us without any time to adjust my glasses to see it plus take pictures. i was wondering, what did i just see? i wasn't sure if maybe the object in the sky had something to do with nellis afb, or something from area 51, or was it just an airplane with an optical illusion. there was no comment from the cockpit and i don't know if anyone else saw it. i'm not sure if we were traveling over california or nevada. about 20 minutes later we were going over mt. charleston. we touched down in las vegas approximately 35 minutes after seeing the object and by that time it was dark. upon landing, the aircraft sounded like it was shaking completely apart. the passengers commented with concern. i have traveled hundreds of thousands of miles and i have never observed an object like that before.
content.summary: Inflight from seattle to las vegas. saw object
